name: Amazonian Queen
quote: “I saw a man call her ‘little lady’ once… just once.”
abilities: Amazonian Queen gains +1 DS for each ‘Female’ Character in your Movie.
title: Gold

name: Beastmaster
quote: “I was an avid student of animal husbandry… until they caught me at it.”
abilities: While you have the Beastmaster in your Movie you can look at the hand of any player who has the “Camel”, “Jungle Cat”, any Skippy card, or any card with the Trait ‘Animal’ in their Movie.
title: Sorcerer

name: Childhood Friend
quote: “Sure, he’s all impressive now with his big sword and his crown, but you should have seen him when his lance accidentally became a pole vault. Why don’y you ask His Majesty about that?”
abilities: Decide the Childhood Friend’s gender when played. Pick a Character in your Movie of the same gender. As long as the Childhood Friend is in play, that Character cannot be killed.
title: Chasm

name: Cursed Shapeshifter
quote: “I see a bad moon a-rising. I see trouble on the way.”
abilities: On your turn you may use Cursed Shapeshifter to make one ‘Supernatural, Monster’ attack with an AS of 8. If the attack succeeds, the Cursed Shapeshifter stays in your Movie. If it fails he is killed. He may not use Props during the attack and if he dies, all his Props are discarded as well.
title: Monster

name: Elven Queen
quote: “Elven Queen/Young and sweet, only 217.”
abilities: The Elven Queen can give the ‘Magic’ Trait to any Character in play until they die. She cannot be the victim of an Attack while at the “Elven Tree Palace”.
title: Land

name: Familiar
quote: “Get off my leg! That’s not what ‘familiar’ means.”
abilities: Defense = 8 while in a Movie with another ‘Magic’ Character.
title: Mysterious

name: Feisty Princess
quote: “Aren’t you a little too short to be a knight in shining armor?”
abilities: All ‘Male’ Characters in the same Movie as the Feisty Princess lose 1 DS.
title: Dungeon

name: Friendly Dragon
quote: “I’ll be your friend forever… or at least until the final scene.”
abilities: Defense = 8 against “Monster’ Attacks. Cannot use Props. When any Player plays “Roll the Credits the Friendly Dragon is killed (before scores are tallied).
title: Spell

name: Helpful Old Cleric
quote: “Bless you, my child, now go kick ass!”
abilities: Defense = 6 against ‘Supernatural’ Attacks.
title: Battle

name: King Incognito
quote: “Even under the cloak, the crown’s a dead give away.”
abilities: Gains double the printed bonus from the “Crown”.
title: Blood

name: Muscle-Bound Barbarian Warrior
quote: “Crooooooooooooommmm- mmmmmmmmmmmmmmm- mm!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!”
abilities: Defense = +10 against ‘Monster’ Attacks.
title: Dark

name: Mysterious Wizard
quote: “I’m wise and all-powerful but it’s always the guy with the sword and the full head of hair that gets the chicks.”
abilities: You may discard a card from your hand and replace it with a card from the discard pile. This ability may not be used on cards that allow you to draw cards or Roll the Credits. You may only use this ability once during each Player’s turn.
title: Black

name: Predestined Hero
quote: “From a stone? Why can’t I just get a sword from the blacksmith, like everyone else?”
abilities: Every time your Movie is attacked or the Hero is the target of an undesired Special Effect, you may fill your hand to its maximum. If any of the new cards can help thwart the attack or Special Effect, you may use them immediately.
title: Mist

name: Prerequisite Little Person
quote: “No, no. Down here.”
title: Forest

name: Reluctant Ranger
quote: “I’ll get you there in one piece but don’t expect me to hold your hand or have any freakin’ sing-alongs!”
abilities: While you have the Reluctant Ranger in your Movie, nothing can happen to your Location unless you allow it.
title: Red

name: Royal Guard
quote: “It’s been an honor to serve you, Your Majesty… GAK!”
abilities: You may sacrifice the Royal Guard to save the life of any of your other Characters.
title: Power

name: Shifty Guy
quote: “They promised me women, wealth, and power… and women.”
abilities: You may play Shifty Guy into another Player’s Movie. At any time after that, you may discard 5 cards from your hand to remove Shifty Guy and play from play and kill one Character of your choice from the same Movie.
title: Great

name: Surly Dwarf
quote: “Look, I’m only nice to one person a day, and today is not your day.”
abilities: Once per turn, on your turn, you may take a ‘Treasure’ Prop out of the discard pile and give it to the Surly Dwarf.
title: Excalibur

name: The Guy Who Dies To Remind Everybody this Isn’t A Picnic
quote: “Oh boy, I’ve always wanted to go on a quest! What are we questing for guys? Treasure? Or fulfilling a prophesy or… GAK!”
abilities: The Guy Who Dies… must be chosen before any other Character in the same Movie as the victim of Attacks and lethal Special Effects cards (as long as he is a legal target).
title: Quest

name: War Horse
quote: “How does he stay so disciplined in battle?” “Before each fight I remind him just how much glue he’ll make if we lose.”
abilities: War Horse can only use non-’Weapon’ Props.
title: Clan

name: Way Too Pretty Elf
quote: “Sure, we live forever, but it takes me a hundred years just to get my hair right.”
abilities: Any card or effect that can target ‘Female’ Characters can effect the Way Too Pretty Elf.
title: Prince

name: Band of Thieves
quote: “If we’re a band, how come we don’t carry no instruments?”
abilities: After the Thieves’ attack is resolved, all Props in the target Movie are discarded. If the attack is successful, the attacker may discard X cards from his hand to steal those X Props instead of removing them from play, and put them in his hand.
title: Neverending

name: Battering Ram
quote: “Baaaa! Thud. Baaa! Thud.”
abilities: Always succeeds at the “Walled City”. May be played as a Special Effect to double the Attack Strength of any other Attack made against a Movie with a Location.
title: Heart

name: Berzerker Halflings from the Dungeon of Dragons
quote: “They’re so adorable… in a homicidal sort of way.”
abilities: If Berzerker Halflings attack a Movie with any ‘Large’ Characters and the attack succeeds, you must kill one of those Characters.
title: Labrynth

name: Big Monster Who Turns Out To Be Just Misunderstood
quote: “Ludo sad.”
abilities: If the Attack fails, the Big Monster is added to the target Movie as a Character with DS 7 and the Trait ‘Large’.
title: Maiden

name: Big Winged Lizard
quote: “At least the fire is only coming out of one end.”
abilities: For every card you discard from your hand when attacking with the Big Winged Lizard, its Attack Strength is increased by +2.
title: Adventure

name: Black Riders
quote: “Black is sooooo middle ages! Somebody call Queer Eye for the Dead Guy.”
abilities: If the Black Riders attack is successful they can;t kill a Character wearing the “Incredibly Powerful Ring That Doesn’t Really Do Much”.
title: Fear

name: Brute Squad
quote: “On the Brute Squad? You are the Brute Squad!”
abilities: If the Brute Squad is successful, all Characters in the target Movie are knocked out until the start of their controller’s next turn. These Characters have Defense = 0 (including Props) and cannot use any special abilities, whether natural or granted by other cards.
title: Glory

name: Catapault Team
quote: “Hurling slaves at the wall isn’t working. We need to hurl heavier slaves… covered in spikes.”
abilities: If successful, the Catapault Team may destroy a Location instead of killing a Character. Attack Strength = 24 against a Movie set in the ‘Walled City”.
title: Crypt

name: Cloaked Assassin
quote: “When coating your blades in poison, be careful not to get any on your skin… oh, crap!” THUD!
title: Epic

name: Demonic God Up To No Good
quote: “Why do the priests always think the things they summon will stop after eating just the sacrifice?”
abilities: Demonic God gains +1 AS for each ‘Magic’ Character in the Movie he is attacking.
title: Silver

name: Evil Wizard
quote: “When we have summoned the Great One, I shall serve at his right hand.” “Serve us all up as a human sacrifice!”
abilities: May be played as a Special Effect to triple the Attack Strength of the “Demonic God Up To No Good”.
title: Goblin

name: Fire Beast
quote: “Hey everyone, it’s going to be okay. I can see a light at the end of the tunnel!”
abilities: Attack = 5 against ‘Aquatic’ Locations.
title: Flame

name: Goblin Horde
quote: “What babe? … What power? … Who do? … Do what? … What babe? …”
abilities: May be combined with the “Goblin King” in an Attack.
title: Champion

name: Goblin King
quote: “You remind me of the babe… the babe with the power… the power of voodo… you do… remind me of the babe!”
abilities: May be combined with the “Goblin Horde” in an Attack.
title: Temple

name: Grand Vizier
quote: “Why don’t kings just have these guys executed on spec? I mean when have you ever heard of a good Grand Vizier?”
abilities: Gains +5 Attack Strength for each Creature you discard from your hand when attacking with the Grand Vizier.
title: Steel

name: Great Serpent
quote: “It’s like one big tentacle with teeth!”
title: Journey

name: Lecherous Religious Official
quote: “Is he a man of God or a man of gold?”
abilities: Attack Strength = 15 vs. any Movie with the “Old Church”, “Old Priest”, “Monastery”, “Old Monk”, “Preacher Man”, “Reverend Minister” or the “Helpful Old Cleric” in it.
title: Eternal

name: Skeletal Army
quote: “The wrist bone’s connected to the hand bone and the hand bone’s connected to the big sword…”
abilities: Skeletal Army always succeeds at the “Haunted Tomb”.
title: Doom

name: Skippy the Wonder Warg
quote: “What’s that, Skippy? You want to pillage and plunder?”
abilities: May be played as a Special Effect to triple the Attack Strength of “Goblin Horde”.
title: Camelot

name: Swamp Monster
quote: “Great Zarquon! That’s a lot of tentacles!”
abilities: If the Swamp Monster is successful, you may discard three cards from your hand to kill an extra Character from the target Movie.
title: Horde

name: Troll
quote: “Who wants some fresh Trollhouse cookies?”
abilities: If successful, the Troll may kill two Characters.
title: Secret

name: Ugly Inhuman Warriors
quote: “Those guys dell out of the ugly tree and hit every single branch on the way down.”
abilities: May be used as a Special Effect card to triple the Attack Strength of either the “Catapault Team” or the “Battering Ram”.
title: Story

name: Viking Invaders
quote: “Rape and pillage, that’s all we ever do. Why can’t we ever just see the sights and meet new people?” “Shut up and kill someone, Erik!”
abilities: May use ‘Weapons’, the “Long Boat” and the “Horned Helmet” to boost their Attack Strength.
title: Kingdom

name: War Hounds
quote: “Here, doggie, doggie. I got a nice fleshy treat for you.”
abilities: If War Hounds attack a Movie with any ‘Young’ or ‘Old’ Characters and the attack succeeds you must kill one of those Characters.
title: Wolf

name: Dungeon
quote: “Dark, dank, inescapable… Yep, it’s a dungeon.”
abilities: 'Swarm’ Attacks made in the Dungeon are at half strength (round down).
title: Fable

name: Dwarven Mines
quote: “We’d send a canary in to see if it’s dangerous, but we don’t want to risk the little buggers running off with any gold.”
abilities: Once per turn, on your turn, you may take the bottom card of the discard pile and put it into your hand.
title: Tomb

name: Elven Tree Palace
quote: “I love what you’ve done with the place. Very airy.” “Well, it is 200’ off the ground.”
abilities: For each card you discard while being attacked at this Location Creatures lose 2 AS.
title: Warrior

name: Evil Volcanic Stronghold
quote: “The bad guys always have the coolest hideouts.”
title: God

name: Haunted Tomb
quote: “It’s the Tomb of the Undead Soldier.”
abilities: 'Zombies” always succeed at the Haunted Tomb. Defense = -3 against ‘Supernatural’ Attacks.
title: Knight

name: Idyllic Village of the Little People
quote: “Sure it’s pretty… but man, is it boring!”
abilities: “Berserker Halflings from the Dungeons of Dragons” always succeed in the Idyllic Village.
title: Conqueror

name: Magnificent Castle
quote: “It’s only a model.” “Shhh!”
abilities: The “Dungeon” cannot be used to replace the Magnificent Castle, only add to it.
title: Scepter

name: Makeshift Encampment
quote: “No marshmallows? This is turning into the worst quest ever!”
abilities: Attackers may declare the Makeshift Encampment to be ‘Aquatic’, if they desire.
title: Warlord

name: Murky Swamp
quote: “Swamp, bog, marsh… call it what you like, it still sucks to be here.”
abilities: The “Swamp Monster” and “Leeches” always succeed in the Murky Swamp.
title: Sword

name: Mystical Lake
quote: “The Lake is a reservoir of all that is holy and pure in this world… let’s go skinny dipping!”
abilities: 'Magic’ Characters gain +1 DS while at the Mystical Lake.
title: Mountain

name: Ruined…
quote: “That’s what you get for renting your place to a film crew!”
abilities: Ruined… must be added to another Location. It cannot be played on its own.
title: Stone

name: Snow-Capped Mountain
quote: “Hello! Hello-hello-lo-lo-lo-lo.” “Die-die-ie-ie”
abilities: Creatures must have a minimum printed AS of 12 to attack the Snow-Capped Mountain.
title: Army

name: Tavern
quote: “You’re all sitting in a tavern when a mysterious stranger with an offer enters… stop me if you’ve heard this one.”
abilities: May be combined with the “Idyllic Village of the Little People” or “Walled City”.
title: Tournament

name: The Deep Dark Woods
quote: “I don’t care if it has two legs, four legs or big, tangly roots. If it moves, shoot it.”
abilities: All non-’Monster’ Attacks have their printed Attack Strength halved (round down).
title: Magic

name: The Wasteland
quote: “Barren rocks, bubbling pools of sludge… all it needs if a few throw pillows and it’ll feel just like home.”
abilities: This card does nothing… what do you expect in a Wasteland?
title: Barbarian

name: Walled City
quote: “Look pal, if you belonged in here, you’d have been inside already when we built the wall!”
abilities: The “Brute Squad” and the “City Watch” always succeed in the Walled City.
title: Serpent

name: Chainmail Bikini
quote: “That’s not much in the way of armor.” “Oh it’s not armor, it’s a weapon of mass distraction.”
abilities: 'Female’ Characters wearing the Bikini gain +4 to their DS and the Trait ‘Cool’.
title: Hunter

name: Crossbow
quote: “What’s a crossbow?” “Well, it’s like a regular bow, but angrier.”
abilities: While you have the Crossbow in play, you may discard 4 cards from your hand to stop any non-’Swarm’ Attack made against you.
title: Tower

name: Crown
quote: “Must be a king.” “How can you tell?” “He’s the only one who doesn’t have crap all over him.”
abilities: Your maximum hand size is increased to 7 while you have the Crown in your Movie.
title: Ring

name: Dragonscale Shield
quote: “Didn’t do so hot protecting the dragon, did it?”
abilities: Discard the Dragonscale Shield from play to stop a ‘Monster’ attack made against your Movie.
title: Slayer

name: Horned Helmet
quote: “Do you think he’s overcompensating for something?” “Yeah, a small brain.”
abilities: Defense = +6 on the “Muscle-Bound Barbarian Warrior”.
title: War

name: Incredibly Powerful Ring That Doesn’t Really Do Much
quote: “What does it matter if it’s magic if you don’t have any idea how to use it?”
abilities: May be played into an opponent’s Movie. You may discard any number of cards from your hand as a Special Effect. The Player who currently has this Prop must discard an equal number. If they don’t have enough cards, they discard their whole hand.
title: Queen

name: Loincloth
quote: “Equal opportunity cheesecake.”
abilities: Defense = +6 on “Muscle-Bound Barbarian Warrior” or “Jungle Man”.
title: Throne

name: Long Boat
quote: “That’s a long boat! You think they’re overcompensating for something?” “Small dinghies?”
abilities: Discard the Long Boat from play to take a Location from the discard pile or from another Player’s Movie and put it into yours. You may do this at any time.
title: Fortress

name: Magical Sword
quote: “Strange women lying on their backs in ponds handing out swords are hardly the basis for a responsible system of government!”
abilities: Defense = +10 in the hands of the “Predestined Hero” or at the “Mystical Lake”.
title: Fellowship

name: Plundered Armor
quote: “The guy you took it from got killed, so what makes you think it’ll serve you any better?”
abilities: Defense = +10 on the “Predestined Hero” or “King Incognito”.
title: Crown

name: Pointy Hat
quote: “Everybody else has a hat. I want one, too.”
abilities: Grants the wearer the Trait ‘Magic’. Defense = +4 on a Character who was ‘Magic’ before putting on this Hat.
title: Return

name: Staff
quote: “I am master of the primal forces of the universe-- OW!.. Damn splinters.”
abilities: Defense = +8 to the “Mysterious Old Wizard”. May be played as a Special Effect to triple the Attack Strength of an Attack involving the “Evil Wizard”.
title: Reign

name: Sturdy Woolen Cloak
quote: “It’s clothing, it’s a pillow, it’s a towel… It’s the new Swiss Army Cloak.”
abilities: While the Sturdy Woolen Cloak is in your Movie, you are immune to the “Inclement Weather” card.
title: Castle

name: Tankard of Ale
quote: “Courage, armor and stupidity all in one glass!”
abilities: Defense = +8 while in the “Tavern”, “Saloon”, “Wharfside Tavern” or in the hands of the “Town Drunk”.
title: Rider

name: Treasure Chest
quote: “I said pack light.” “For a dwarf, this is light.”
abilities: When you play the Treasure Chest, put any number of Props from your hand or your Movie underneath it. They no longer count towards your Defensive Strength but they do add to your score when the Credits are Rolled. If the Character carrying the Treasure Chest is killed, you may move it to one of your other Characters or discard it.
title: Fire

name: Unique But Highly Unrealistic Weapon
quote: “Thrown one way, it’ll slice through granite. Another way and it’ll knock a guy out. Another way and…” “I get it. But if it’s so sharp, how do I catch it without losing my fingers?”
title: Dragon

name: Roll the Credits
quote: “Well, evil has been tossed into the volcano, so I guess it’s over.”
title: King

name: Roll the Credits
quote: “Well, the dragon’s dead and there aren’t any more virgins around here, so I guess it’s over.”
title: Lord

name: ...Of Invisibility
quote: “Now you see me… now you don’t.”
abilities: Play on a Prop currently in play. Double the printed Defensive Strength of the Prop and as long as the Character who carries it is in a Location, that Character cannot be the victim of any Creature attack.
title: Crystal

name: Against All Odds
quote: “We don’t have to hold long, just until the reinforcements arrive… a week from Tuesday.”
abilities: Until the end of your next turn, Attacks are made at double the printed Attack Strength and have the Trait ‘Swarm’.
title: Sun

name: Always the Victim, Never the Bride
quote: “Something old, something new, something borrowed, someone blue.”
abilities: Kill one ‘Female’ Character.
title: Mystical

name: Arcane Wisdom
quote: “If you’re so all-fired smart, how come you aren’t going on the quest?” “Ever notice how some questions answer themselves?”
abilities: Double the printed Defensive Strength of one ‘Magic’ Character for as long as it is remains in play.
title: Enchanted

name: Armory
quote: “Ooooh! It’s the Marquis de Sade’s garage sale!”
abilities: Take a Prop from the discard pile and give it to any Character in play.
title: River

name: Blue Screen
quote: “You’re an actor… ACT like you’re some place real!”
abilities: For the duration of the current Attack, the target Player treats his or her Movie as though it were in any one Location of your choice, that is either the current in play or in the discard pile.
title: Falcon

name: But That Is A Story For Another Time
quote: “You mean they’re saving it for the sequel.”
abilities: Stop one Attack.
title: Beast

name: CGI To The Rescue
quote: “How are we going to film an army of two million zombie goblins?” “Copy and paste… and copy and paste…”
abilities: Double the Attack Strength of the current Attack and give it the Trait ‘Swarm’.
title: Prisoner

name: Dark Pact
quote: “Doesn’t anyone learn that crossing your fingers when dealing with the devil doesn’t work?”
abilities: Announce a type of card (other than Roll the Credits). Each player must give you a card of that type. For each Player who cannot, they must show you their hand and you may draw a card of that type from the discard pile.
title: Strength

name: Heart Throb
quote: “I don’t get it. I mean he’s not bad looking but what’s the big deal? And what the hell sort of name is Viggo?”
abilities: Give one ‘Male’ Character a permanent +2 Defensive Strength for as long as they remain in your Movie.
title: Keep

name: Horde of…
quote: “Didn’t we just leave this party?”
abilities: Take a Creature card out of the discard pile and make an Attack with it. Attack Strength is doubled and it now has the Trait ‘Swarm’.
title: Titan

name: I’ll Take the First Watch
quote: “Notice how nobody ever volunteers to take the middle watch?” “Well sure, cause that’s when all the bad stuff happens.”
abilities: Stop the use of any Special Effect card or one use of the special ability of any card in play.
title: Romance

name: In 3-D!
quote: “Everything’s all fuzzy.” “Don’t tell me you forgot to get the special glasses!”
abilities: Triple the Attack Strength of the current Attack.
title: Time

name: Inclement Weather
quote: “Roof’s leaking again.” “No it’s not, it’s missing.”
abilities: Play on a Location in play. All Characters at that Location lose -1 DS. This card stays in effect until that Location is switched or destroyed.
title: Wizard

name: Just One More Scene To Go
quote: “That’s what you said 30 minutes ago!”
abilities: Play after someone has played Roll the Credits. Play continues for one more round and ends with the Player who played Roll the Credits.
title: Hiberia

name: Let’s See That Prophesy Come True Now!
quote: “Now that I’ve thwarted the destiny of the gods, surely nothing can stand in the way of my plans…”
abilities: Kill all ‘Young’ Characters.
title: Hunt

name: Loot the Bodies
quote: “Go get yourself something shiny.”
abilities: Play whenever you kill a Character by any means. You may put all of their Props into your hand.
title: Village

name: Magical Aura
quote: “Uh-oh, my sorcery-sense is tingling.”
abilities: Reverse the integer of the current defense of any Location in play. If the Location normally gives a positive bonus, now it is a negative and vice versa. (eg. +5 = -5, -3 = +3, etc.).
title: Riddle

name: Moat
quote: “Hey, are those goldfish in there?”
abilities: Grants a Location the ‘Aquatic’ Trait and doubles its Defensive Strength for as long as it remains in play.
title: Evil

name: Mystical Amulet
quote: “The mystical amulet of Tatonga? I got it from a holy man. Said it was his last one.” “Well that makes me feel better.”
abilities: Double the current Attack Strength of a ‘Magic’ Attack OR double the current Defensive Strength of a Movie being attacked by a ‘Magic’ Attack.
title: Citadel

name: Noble Death
quote: “People will tell tales of your sacrifice for centuries to come… so try not to blubber too much.”
abilities: Kill one ‘Male’ Character.
title: Eagle

name: Personal Trainer
quote: “Feel the burn. No pain, no gain.” “Am I paying you for cliches?”
abilities: Double the printed Defensive Strength of any non-’Old’ Character for as long as it remains in play and give it the Trait ‘Large’.
title: Curse

name: Pushed Too Far
quote: “Never taunt the hero! It only makes him more determined!”
abilities: Give a permanent +2 Defensive Strength to one Character OR double the Defensive Strength of one Movie for the duration of the current Attack.
title: Empire

name: Re-Casting
quote: “There’s one thing about this production that’s just not working for me… all the actors.”
abilities: Take all Characters in play and shuffle them together. Leave their Props and other attached cards where they are to mark their place. Each Player is then dealt a number of Characters equal to the number they had before this card was played. Each Character is placed randomly with each pile (if any) of Props and other attached cards. If this random placement creates any illegal card combinations to occur, those cards are discarded from play as well as all unattached cards.
title: Guard

name: Royal Banquet
quote: “That’s an entire roast pig!” “Betcha five gold pieces you won’t eat the nose.”
abilities: Draw a number of cards equal to twice the number of Players. Look at them and then give two cards to each Player.
title: Arcane

name: Scroll Of Usefulness
quote: “I knew this would come in handy one day…”
abilities: Play at any time to take any Special Effect card from the discard pile and use it immediately.
title: Blade

name: Secret Passage
quote: “Where do these stairs go?” “They go up.”
abilities: Play this card along with two Locations or with one Location adding it to a one already in play. From now on, whatever happens to one of the cards, happens to both.
title: Key

name: Secret Plots
quote: “You have plans I can’t begin to imagine, let alone comprehend. I mean, I have plans you can’t… I can’t believe I did it again!”
abilities: Play at any time to take a free turn. When that turn ends, play resumes with the interrupted Player’s turn already in progress. You may not Roll the Credits on your free turn.
title: Emperess

name: So Peaceful…
quote: “The monsters leave us alone and we leave them the occasional human sacrifice. Works out for everyone involved.” “Except the sacrifices.”
abilities: Target Location gains +15 Defensive Strength vs. Creature Attacks for as long as it remains in play. However, at the start of every turn, its owner must kill a Character that is there.
title: Olympus

name: Spell Gone Haywire
quote: “Did I say ‘eye of newt’ or ‘toe of frog’?”
abilities: Stop one Special Effect as it’s played OR remove one card with the trait ‘Magic’ from play. This can be used to stop a ‘Magic’ Attack in progress.
title: Asgaard

name: Spellcasting
quote: “Abra-cadabra!”
abilities: +5 Defensive Strength for the duration of the current Attack OR stop one Attack if you have a 'Magic' Character in play.
title: Lady

name: Stygian Darkness
quote: “I can’t see my hand in front of my face.” “How about the sword sticking out of your stomach?”
abilities: Double the Attack Strength of the current Attack.
title: Legend

name: Surprise Return
quote: “We thought you were dead!” “And don’t you feel stupid now?”
abilities: Remove a Character from the discard pile and put it into play in the Movie of your choice.
title: Death

name: The Plague
quote: “You don’t look so good. Say something?” “Plaaagggue.”
abilities: Kill one Character from every Player’s Movie, including your own. You may not play this card if you don’t have at least one Character.
title: Unicorn

name: Thick Fog
quote: “Did anyone order the soup? I didn’t order this soup.”
abilities: Halve (round down) either the Attack Strength or Defensive Strength for the duration of the current Attack.
title: Hero

name: Trap
quote: “They’ve been expecting us all along!”
abilities: Play when making a Creature Attack. Take the top five cards off the draw pile. If any of them can be used to enhance your attack, you may play them. Unused cards are shuffled back into the draw pile.
title: Destroyer

name: True to the Source
quote: “We’re going to get lynched if it isn’t exactly like it was in the book.”
abilities: Change the outcome of any Attack from success to failure or failure to success.
title: Clash

name: Under Siege!
quote: “20 men on the walls, another 50 in the courtyard. There’s one gate and I hold the only key. This fortress is impregnable.” “Then who were those masked guys with swords I just saw running toward the vault?”
abilities: Destroy one Location. For every card you discard from your hand when playing Under Seige!, you may kill one Character who was at that Location.
title: Royal

name: Unforeseen Delay
quote: “I told you to go before we left!”
abilities: Force the Player of your choice to miss his or her next turn.
title: Age

name: Unholy Alliance
quote: “When they said it would be a battle of the five armies, who thought it would be four against one?”
abilities: You may play as many Creature cards as you like when declaring an Attack. Other Players (except the target of the Attack) may also contribute up to one Creature each to the Attack. The entire Attack has all the Traits and rules of each Creature involved.
title: Tyrant

name: Wizards’ Duel
quote: “Only one of us is getting out of this alive and it’s not going to be me… I mean you, Damnit! I always get that mixed up.
abilities: Pick any two ‘Magic’ Characters from different Movies. Whichever of the two controlling Players discards more cards from their hand wins the duel. The losing Character is killed. In the event of a tie, both Characters are killed.
title: Emperor
